ability.Sand Stream: Summons a sandstorm for five turns when it enters the battle.
ability.Sturdy: The Pokemon endures the one-hit knockout move with 1 HP left.

Roar of Rock.effect: Fighting and Fairy-type Pokemon are not immue to this move. Rather, it deals x2 effect to them.

Wild Release.effect: Raises the user's attack and speed by 1 stage. If in Sandstorm, raises the user's attack and speed by 2 stages.

Fire Fang.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.

Taunt.effect: Prevents the target from using status moves for its next three turns.
